thread.title: Woman inspires with strength, faith | Local News | reflector.com
thread.title_full: Woman inspires with strength, faith | Local News | reflector.com

author: Beyonca Mewborn Correspondent
title: Woman inspires with strength, faith | Local News | reflector.com
text: WINTERVILLE — A woman’s unshakable faith and a pact she made with God has empowered her to walk with him every day and inspire others along the way. Martha Taylor, 65, began walking regularly at Winterville’s Hillcrest Park to prepare for bilateral knee surgery.
